Cleave Together: The Dragon King's Treasure

name: Cleave Together: The Dragon King's Treasure
storyline:
In this Hybrid Visual Novel Dating Sim and RPG you will take on the role of a young man who is just starting college, who meets new friends by playing an MMORPG together with them.

The game switches between IRL Segments and RPG Segments. In the Visual Novel portion of the game you will attend classes to train and become a Dessert Chef, or socialize with friends in the real world. Then, when you log in to play an online game with the friends you've made, you will switch to the top-down pixel-art based RPG gameplay.
summary: A Hybrid Visual Novel Dating Sim and RPG where the player takes on the role of a young man who is just starting college, who meets new friends by playing an MMORPG together with them.
